channel.title: android on Home
channel.description: Recent content in android on Home

item.title: Mitmproxy and Android
item.description: Introduction Debugging network traffic for your app can be useful, and sometimes necessary if the data is not what is expected or inconsistent. The Proxy I prefer the open source proxy [mitmproxy](https://mitmproxy.org =300x203). Easy to install on OSX with homebrew.

item.title: Blackberry + Push + Android Hacking
item.description: I would like to track my experience with setting up push messaging for blackberry using an android application. The main blackberry link on this subject provides some basics, however I will try go into some detail on the process I used.

item.title: Droid Fortunes: An Experiment in Android Widgets
item.description: Background I have it set up on my OSX machine to give me a random fortune when I log into the shell. I thought it would be a good idea to port this to Android in the form of a widget and Droid Fortunes was born!
